description: Monday, 5 January: Besides, Mazid Uddin (45), an activist of Solua union unit of BNP in Charghat upazila of Rajshahi district, was killed as police opened fire on a procession of the BNP-led 20-party alliance at Baneshwar in the upazila on Monday afternoon
